content.description: Climb a really good ladder of juggy crimps and throw for slopey bucket holds at the top.

climbs.name: Dragon Breath
climbs.fa: Tanner? Ian? Some other dude from Crux?

content.description: Use compression moves to work up a flake to a finish with slopey jugs.
content.location: Left side of the WesterRoast Boulder.

content.description: Starts with a roof pull on small crimps. Gain good holds in the middle and cling on for dear life. The crux is at the top and involves finding a better exit strategy than what the Lannister twins could conceive.Â
content.location: Right side of The WesterRoast Boulder.

content.description:
A short, not-so-steep boulder located next to a blonde cliff. This might be a good boulder to start with if you wasted the last eight years of your life binge watching HBO fantasy shows steeped in disappointment.

 Note: This is more than likely not a "new" boulder. Locals have climbed it for years. However, it has now been cleaned of choss and all the big, pointy rocks have been removed from the landing zones. Hopefully these slight improvements will get more pebble pounders to come and crush it since it deserves to be climbed. Topping out and walking off the back are easy. This might not be a "destination area" but it is a good place to get a quick workout in.
